    • Field Detail

      • DELIMITER

        private final java.lang.String DELIMITER
        Delimiter of the DVD Library file
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • orderMap

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​Order> orderMap
        Map that will temporarily hold Order info from an order .txt file. It will allow the info to be displayed and edited. Then the Map will be used to overwrite the same order .txt file. The key is the order code as an int, The Value is the Order object

      • stateTaxMap

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Tax> stateTaxMap
        Map will hold the State Tax info from the "Taxes.txt" file. It will be read at the startup of App. The key is the State's Abbreviation as a String, .The Value is the Tax object containing the state's name and tax rate

      • productTypeMap

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Product> productTypeMap
        Map will hold the Product type info from the "Products.txt" file. It will be read at the startup of App. The key is the ProductType's name as a String .The Value is the Product object containing its name, cost and labour per square ft

      • nextavailableOrderNumber

        private static int nextavailableOrderNumber
        Used to keep track of next available order number

      • readFile

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> readFile​(java.lang.String fileName,
                                                   FileHeaders fileType)
                                            throws FlooringMasteryPersistenceException
        Description copied from interface: FlooringMasteryDao
        Opens fileName.txt file. It then transfers info into a ArrayList to hold in memory. The file name only needs the name of the file, not the directory path
        Specified by:
        readFile in interface FlooringMasteryDao
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the file being read (not the directory path)
        fileType - the type of file being read (Tax, Product or Order)
        Returns:
        ArrayList of String Arrays of the split up file lines
        Throws:
        FlooringMasteryPersistenceException
